main event: Two young boys reported observing a bright, round metallic object in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, on March 6, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as round, metallic, and about 8 to 10 feet in diameter.,Witnesses observed the object making sharp turns and accelerating at high speeds.,The object disappeared due to cloud cover after exhibiting unusual maneuvers.,The sighting lasted for 35 minutes and involved young boys and a neighbor.,Investigating officers concluded that the observed object was likely an unidentified flying object.
